subject: Re: Follow Up
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Derek, 

The easiest way to do this is our PPI or project prove it. 

It will come across as a contract but it will have an opt out.  After 90 days if it doesn't make sense we drop it and no payment required. 

If you end up liking it and feeling that it is worth it, it rolls into a contract or amendment. 

I can send this to you later today, but not sure if this would be something the Chief would sign or the City Manager. 

Thanks  




It is a contract  
 <https://us-5372.email-composer-webhooks.gong.io/email-tracking/open?email-info-token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJjb21wYW55SWQiOiI3MjU2ODg5NjUzNzQ5MzgwNzYyIiwiZHJhZnRJZCI6InItNjc5MjM0NzIwODgyOTQwOTU1NyIsImV4cCI6MTc1MTA0NDMxMCwiaWF0IjoxNzQ5MjI5OTEwLCJqdGkiOiJOZGRqajRFVkx4SksifQ._-lBMJGoJJsYWVSoCTwLKQ6XObtTue6fxeaXeSj-fsI> 

On Fri, Jun 6, 2025 at 10:00?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Lets start the three month trial and we can see where we land after that.

	
	Thank you,

	
	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: David Johnson <david.johnson@flocksafety.com david.johnson@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Tuesday, June 3, 2025 1:17 PM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Follow Up

	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Derek, 
	
	My apologies for the delayed follow up. 
	
	I wanted to get some answers prior to sending you anything. 
	
	After speaking with Caroline and My Director we could do a three month Trial, where at the end of the three months you have an out clause if you don't want it, or if you do the trial converts to a contract.  Usually the trials go 30 days just fyi.  I fought for as long as I could. 
	
	I have attached a quote for your review, however I have some creative ideas to make this less expensive if you are open to a quick call.  I am talking possibly half or more depending on a few things. 

	 

	Thanks  

	 

	-- 

	
David Johnson
Account Executive
